caption.p: COVID-19 Vaccine Candidates in Clinical Development (21 as of June 29, 2020).

tr.td: Adenovirus Type 5 Vector expressing S protein
CanSino Biological Inc., Beijing Institute of Biotechnology
Lipid nanoparticle (LNP) encapsulated mRNA encoding S protein
Beijing Institute of Biological Products, Sinopharm
Wuhan Institute of Biological Products, Sinopharm
Full length recombinant SARS CoV-2 glycoprotein nanoparticle vaccine adjuvanted with Matrix M
Institute of Medical Biology, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences
DNA plasmid encoding S protein delivered by electroporation
People's Liberation Army (PLA) Academy of Military Sciences, Walvax Biotech
Anhui Zhifei Longcom Biopharmaceutical, Institute of Microbiology, Chinese Academy of Sciences
Autologous Dendritic Cells with SARS-CoV-2 antigens, administered with granulocyteâ€“macrophage colony-stimulating factor (GM-CSF)
Dendritic cells (DC) modified with lentivirus vector, expressing synthetic minigene based on domains of selected viral proteins, administered with antigen specific cytotoxic T lymphocytes (CTLs)
Artificial antigen-presenting cells (aAPCs) modified with lentiviral vector, expressing synthetic minigene based on domains of selected proteins
Live Bifidobacterium longum to deliver plasmids of synthetic DNA encoding SARS-CoV-2 spike protein
